## FieldLabel class

Class for a non-editable, non-serializable text field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class FieldLabel extends Field<string> 
```
**Extends:** [Field](./blockly.field_class.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [EDITABLE](./blockly.fieldlabel_class.editable_property.md) |  | boolean | Editable fields usually show some sort of UI indicating they are editable. This field should not. |
|  [maxDisplayLength](./blockly.fieldlabel_class.maxdisplaylength_property.md) |  | number | Text labels should not truncate. |
